name: Annihilation
victoryScreenHeader: Build Project Sundial and annihilate the world.
victoryString: You have won the final war. Your enemies eternally burried under miles of rubble and fallout, the land they once resided in is forever contaminated, the sun they once admired being blocked by numerous soot-filled clouds. You have won, yet at what cost?
defeatString: You have lost, your enemies have built a world ending weapon. Your nation is forever doomed to be buried under miles of radioactive soot and soil, and your land and skies eternally filled with waste and soot. There is nothing left to do in this world.
